wikipedia_page.main: Dr William Henry Lowe FRSE PRCPE (died 16 August 1900) was a Scottish physician and amateur botanist. He served as President of the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh 1873 to 1875. He was also President of the Royal Medical Society and the Botanical Society of London.
